function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited outdoor space in housing environments due to the pandemic confinement","Impact":"Reduced access to recreational areas and increased clustering in limited spaces","Mitigation":"Creating more outdoor spaces within housing environments to accommodate recreational activities","Technologies":"Urban planning and architecture designs that prioritize outdoor spaces in residential areas","People":"Citizens living in confined housing environments","Owner":"Local governments and urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of accessibility to parks and recreational areas","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for physical activity and social interaction","Mitigation":"Incorporating green infrastructure such as green roofs to provide accessible outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Green roof installations on residential and commercial buildings","People":"Citizens in areas with limited access to parks and recreational areas","Owner":"Building owners and developers"},{"Description":"Increased risk of airborne diseases due to limited outdoor ventilation","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Promoting the use of green roofs and green infrastructure to improve air quality and ventilation","Technologies":"Green roof technology, air filtration systems","People":"Citizens living in confined housing environments","Owner":"Health organizations and building owners"}]}
